key.name: invert-horizontal-rotation-direction
key.description: Invert horizontal rotation direction of the screen

key.name: invert-vertical-rotation-direction
key.description: Invert vertical rotation direction of the screen

key.name: flip-orientation
key.description: Alter orientation. (e.g: Landscape to Portrait. Default is Landscape.)

key.name: orientation-offset
key.description: Experiment with this offset in case orientation is incorrect.

key.name: manual-flip
key.description: Enable a toggle in the GNOME Shell System Menu to manually flip between landscape and portrait.

key.name: manual-flip-menu-item-selection
key.description: Store the flip orientation to activate when GNOME Shell System Menu manual flip button is activated.

key.name: hide-lock-rotate
key.description: Hide the 'Auto Rotate' quick toggle.

key.name: landscape-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the landscape orientation.

key.name: portrait-right-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the portrait (right) orientation.

key.name: portrait-left-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the portrait (left) orientation.

key.name: landscape-flipped-osk
key.description: Enable the use of the On-Screen-Keyboard for the landscape (flipped) orientation.

key.name: dor-keyboard-landscape
key.description: Toggle disabling the keyboard when the orientation is landscape.

key.name: dor-keyboard-portrait-left
key.description: Toggle disabling the keyboard when the orientation is portrait left.

key.name: dor-keyboard-landscape-flipped
key.description: Toggle disabling the keyboard when the orientation is landscape-flipped.

key.name: dor-keyboard-portrait-right
key.description: Toggle disabling the keyboard when the orientation is portrait right.

key.name: dor-touchpad-landscape
key.description: Toggle disabling the touchpad when the orientation is landscape.

key.name: dor-touchpad-portrait-left
key.description: Toggle disabling the touchpad when the orientation is portrait left.

key.name: dor-touchpad-landscape-flipped
key.description: Toggle disabling the touchpad when the orientation is landscape-flipped.

key.name: dor-touchpad-portrait-right
key.description: Toggle disabling the touchpad when the orientation is portrait right.

key.name: debug-logging
key.description: Toggle debug logging.
